img.alt: Report Bullying & Safety Concerns Anonymously with Safe School Helpline

a.span: Report Bullying & Safety Concerns Anonymously with Safe School Helpline

div.p: Follow the directions above for calling or texting a tip, or click on the icon above to submit your bullying or other safety concern online. Be sure to follow the simple steps so that your concern reaches a District 93 administrator. Having harmful thoughts and need to speak with someone? Call the helpline and select 5.

a.title: Go to comments for Report Bullying & Safety Concerns Anonymously with Safe School Helpline

img.alt: Welcome to Community Consolidated School District 93

a.span: Welcome to Community Consolidated School District 93

div.p: Community Consolidated School District 93 strives to maximize the academic, social, and emotional potential of each student.

a.title: Go to comments for Welcome to Community Consolidated School District 93

div.p: CCSD93 offers parents (and any community members who want to download it) a new free mobile app to help you stay even more connected to your child's education. Contact the District Office at 630-539-3004 for your parent login information.

a.title: Go to comments for Download CCSD93's App!

div.p: Are you a parent, educator, school board member, or community member? No matter who you are, your voice matters. Sign up for the LEND Action Network to be involved in the legislative process for Illinois education and receive updates & Action Alerts!

a.title: Go to comments for LEND Action Network

var multimediaGallery11208 = { "props": { "defaultGallery": true, "imageWidth" : 960, "imageHeight" : 500, "pageModuleInstanceId": "11208", "moduleInstanceId": "10042", "virtualFolderPath": "/cms/lib/IL02204518/Centricity/ModuleInstance/10042/" }, "records": [ { "flexDataId": "27224", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Advanced 6th Grade Unnatural Natural Disaster Day!", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Jay Stream students in Mrs. Nauert's 6th grade advanced humanities class recently paired up to research global catastrophes that cannot entirely be classified as "natural disasters," uncovering their unnatural causes in the process.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/IL02204518/Centricity/Domain/14/Screen Shot 2020-03-09 at 10.54.24 AM.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "844", "imageAltText": "Advanced 6th Grade Unnatural Natural Disaster Day!", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A2f8kcDxUDA", "videoIsEmbedded": "True", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "27109", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Middle School Students Explore Vision for 2020", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "The project, called "What's Your Vision in 2020?", is part of a C-Span national competition. Students chose a topic that interested them and were required to thoroughly research it by referencing and citing a wide variety of reputable sources. They delved into all potential viewpoints, thought critically about the subject, and eventually came to a clear understanding of all its complexities and took a personal stance on it. Many students even connected directly with experts in their area of study, creating a truly authentic learning experience. With this in hand, each student wrote a research paper, developed a brochure handout, and created a corresponding multimedia project like a website, podcast or poster.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/IL02204518/Centricity/Domain/14/JS CSPAN.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "844", "imageAltText": "JS CSPAN", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "https://youtu.be/rd-PALuFkxM", "videoIsEmbedded": "True", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "27089", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "CCSD93 Unified Sports Program", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "For the first time ever, CCSD93 is bringing together students with disabilities and students without to form a Unified Sports basketball team at each middle school that will eventually compete against other area schools!", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/IL02204518/Centricity/Domain/14/Screen Shot 2020-01-24 at 2.53.39 PM.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "844", "imageAltText": "CCSD93 Unified Sports Program Image", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "https://youtu.be/dUPrzF0VL3c", "videoIsEmbedded": "True", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "27094", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "CCSD93 Dual Language Program Teaches Students to Become Bilingual", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "CCSD93's Dual Language program teaches students to become bilingual in English and Spanish starting in kindergarten, with the goal of not only learning the lifelong skill of being able to speak and write in both languages, but also gaining a broader education about diverse cultures and backgrounds.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/IL02204518/Centricity/Domain/14/Screen Shot 2020-01-27 at 8.41.17 AM.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "844", "imageAltText": "DL Image", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "https://youtu.be/T-712iNGbu8", "videoIsEmbedded": "True", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "27009", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "CCSD93's Early Childhood Center", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "If you're in need of a preschool for your child, then look no further than CCSD93's award-winning Early Childhood Center (ECC)! The ECC provides a play-based environment that helps students of all backgrounds develop independent thought, problem solving, a sense of self worth, and successful group interactions in a safe and nurturing space designed just for 3- and 4-year-olds.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/IL02204518/Centricity/Domain/14/ECCVideoimage.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "844", "imageAltText": "ECC Video", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "https://youtu.be/s5-1MFwZHYM", "videoIsEmbedded": "True", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "25782", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Western Trails CATS Teachers host First Cultural Connections Day!", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Students from Western Trails participated in Cultural Connection Day during their CATS time. As they moved from activity to activity, they traveled across continents, creating music influenced by African nations, designing Mehndi body art originally from India, and playing the Ancient Mayan game of Pok Ta Pok from Central America. Find out more about the terrific experience here!", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/IL02204518/Centricity/Domain/14/Screen Shot 2019-11-06 at 8.36.59 AM.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "795", "imageAltText": "Western Trails CATS Teachers host First Cultural Connections Day!", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "http://", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "https://youtu.be/R9bS5jnOC2c", "videoIsEmbedded": "True", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "25781", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Stratford 8th Graders Study Alien Life in IC Dome!", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "8th graders in Mrs. Bruning's science class at Stratford Middle School studied life on other planets in the Innovation Center's Dome! Learn about how the Dome provides especially engaging and immersive learning experiences for students and how these 8th graders will apply their lesson to relevant, real-world happenings here!", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/IL02204518/Centricity/Domain/14/Screen Shot 2019-11-06 at 8.29.47 AM.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "792", "imageAltText": "Stratford 8th Graders Study Alien Life in IC Dome!", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "https://youtu.be/4nAIGEVkdbg", "videoIsEmbedded": "True", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "25758", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "CCSD93 Explorers Week 2019", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Prime examples from 2019 include 4th grade students at Cloverdale Elementary School who virtually explored China and learned how to write words and phrases in Mandarin and students across all grade levels at Western Trails Elementary School who explored the world of computer programming, pushing themselves to learn the critical language of coding through stations in the school's Innovation Center. Meanwhile, young students at Elsie Johnson School explored the world around them, cataloguing their neighborhood with self-taken tablet and drone footage. To find out more about Explorers Week view the video linked here.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/IL02204518/Centricity/Domain/14/Screen Shot 2019-10-31 at 8.50.35 AM.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "838", "imageAltText": "CCSD93 Explorers Week 2019", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "http://", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "https://youtu.be/tpTL9b4aGUc", "videoIsEmbedded": "True", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "25759", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Cloverdale School 5th Graders - Adopt A Highway", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Today (9/27/19), Cloverdale School 5th graders in Mrs. Aigner's class spent time beautifying school grounds and nearby areas along Merbach Drive as the class participated in the Village of Carol Stream's Adopt-a-Highway program. Each of the school's 5th grade classes will take a date throughout the school year to ensure the road is clean and clear of debris. The event tied in with the grade level's broader lessons on volunteerism, positive citizenship, and taking care of the community.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/IL02204518/Centricity/Domain/14/Screen Shot 2019-10-31 at 8.56.33 AM.png", "imageWidth": "1500", "imageHeight": "840", "imageAltText": "Cloverdale School 5th Graders - Adopt A Highway", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "http://", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "https://youtu.be/KwmF2bADWxo", "videoIsEmbedded": "True", "videoIframe": "" }, {}] };

div.span: CCSD93 is committed to continual growth in creating a website platform that is accessible for all. For any assistance needed, please call CCSD93 at 630-539-3004.
